thread.title: Great staff, good location, comfortable rooms
thread.title_full: Great staff, good location, comfortable rooms - Review of Executive Hotel LeSoleil, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jessicasZ1334UI
title: Great staff, good location, comfortable rooms
text: Nicely renovated and close to midtown, just a few doors down from Keens Steakhouse, which is a "must visit" if you are looking for a high quality, old school steak-and-martini dinner. I stayed for 5 nights on business and had an issue with my room, which they swiftly took care of. All the staff was great, especially Marjorie, the manager who was responsive and kind. I definitely plan to stay here again.
